fol.69r
Belgia 1591 stilo Ro
m
10 Fe
b
M
r
Bodly
Belgia 1591. Feb
r
S
r
. itt hathe plesed my
Lo president
as yow fortold mee to have
met here to fynishe his businesses, w
ch
must have great
hellp from yow or ells I am afrayd thay will not proceed so as
is expected by her
Ma
tie
,
in consideration wherof I bessech yow
t
yow will as soon as yow can send your opinion for
S
r
Thomas
Baskervyle
, and
S
r
Edmond Uvdall
how far yow think
my Lo presi dents commission made unto them by vertew of that
w
ch
hir Ma
tie
gave him, may warrant them for
e bringing
forthe of there cumpanies out of
Breda,
wherof thay mak
for the dout bycause they have not seen his, w
ch
was not bycause
hee woold not show itt them, but bycause thay were not att
Vlishinge
whan hee made itt, but was faine to hav itt w
th
e
Leutenant governor
of
e town to bee first unto them: thay will
take knoledge therof from yow bycause thay know
t
yow
have seen itt; And the commission being graced by your good
advyce I know will effect more in
e hands of men of there
qualitye than in any others of meaner place.
[yo]
Your letters to him, and all
e rest
t
come out of
Ingland
I have
opened as hee left order w
th
mee
t
I shoold; by them out of
Ingland I fynd
t
the jorney as is [mutch] hastned, and by yours
t
there will bee great difficultie in
e dispatches from heer,
notw
th
standing considering
e importance therof itt is hoped
t
yow will do your best to
e advancement thereof, w
ch
I will still
bee bolld to crave from yow as I shall have cause, and bessech [.]
yow think my service or indevor may do any thing therin
t
yow will command itt;
And for
if ytt will please yow to
have any thing w
th
mee if yow send your letters to
e Inglishe
howse in Middleborow,
for
to
e host therof thay shall bee presently
sent mee to
Berghen
where I mean to remayne for 4 or 5 days
and than to return hether, in hope by that to have more absolute
order out of Ingland for all thinges.
And so Commending
my service unto yow I leve yow in hast. Middleborg the
10th of fe
b
1590
Your very loving frend to Command. Anthony Wingfielde.
